inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>); 
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where Source_s =~ "AzTS_01_ScopeResolverTriggerProcessor" and OperationName =~ "QueueScopes"
| where ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Initiated"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize InitiatedCount = count() by OperationName = tolower(OperationName), ResourceType = tolower(ResourceType)
| join kind=leftouter (
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where Source_s =~ "AzTS_01_ScopeResolverTriggerProcessor" and OperationName =~ "QueueScopes"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize 
Succeeded = countif(ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Succeeded"),
Failed = countif(ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Failed") by OperationName = tolower(OperationName), ResourceType = tolower(ResourceType)
| order by OperationName, ResourceType 
) on OperationName, ResourceType
| extend Dangling = iff(InitiatedCount == Failed + Succeeded, 0, InitiatedCount-Failed-Succeeded)
| project OperationName, ResourceType, InitiatedCount, Succeeded, Failed, Dangling

content.Query:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>); 
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where Source_s =~ "AzTS_01_ScopeResolverTriggerProcessor" and OperationName =~ "QueueScopes"
| where ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Initiated"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize InitiatedCount = count() by OperationName = tolower(OperationName), ResourceType = tolower(ResourceType)
| join kind=leftouter (
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where Source_s =~ "AzTS_01_ScopeResolverTriggerProcessor" and OperationName =~ "QueueScopes"
| where ProcessingStatus_s !~ "Initiated"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize 
Succeeded = countif(ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Succeeded"),
Failed = countif(ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Failed") by OperationName = tolower(OperationName), ResourceType = tolower(ResourceType)
| order by OperationName, ResourceType 
) on OperationName, ResourceType
| extend Dangling = iff(InitiatedCount == Failed + Succeeded, 0, InitiatedCount-Failed-Succeeded)
| project OperationName, ResourceType, InitiatedCount, Succeeded, Failed, Dangling
content.PartTitle: Progress: Configured scopes triggered for discovery phase
content.PartSubTitle: Number of scope items successfully queued for discovery phase.

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>); 
let TotalVMCount = toscalar(Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where ResourceType =~ "VirtualMachine"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| count);
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where Source_s =~ "AzTS_05_VMExtensionInventoryProcessor" and OperationName =~ "VMExtensionInventoryProcessing"
| where ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Initiated"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize InitiatedCount = count() by OperationName = tolower(OperationName), ResourceType = tolower(ResourceType)
| join kind=leftouter (
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where Source_s =~ "AzTS_05_VMExtensionInventoryProcessor" and OperationName =~ "VMExtensionInventoryProcessing"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize 
Succeeded = countif(ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Succeeded"),
Failed = countif(ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Failed") by OperationName = tolower(OperationName), ResourceType = tolower(ResourceType)
| order by OperationName, ResourceType 
) on OperationName, ResourceType
| extend Dangling = iff(InitiatedCount == Failed + Succeeded, 0, InitiatedCount-Failed-Succeeded)
| project OperationName, ResourceType, ResourceCount = TotalVMCount, InitiatedCount, Succeeded, Failed, Dangling

content.Query:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>); 
let TotalVMCount = toscalar(Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
//| where ResourceType =~ "VirtualMachine"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| count);
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where Source_s =~ "AzTS_05_VMExtensionInventoryProcessor" and OperationName =~ "VMExtensionInventoryProcessing"
| where ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Initiated"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize InitiatedCount = count() by OperationName = tolower(OperationName), ResourceType = tolower(ResourceType)
| join kind=leftouter (
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where Source_s =~ "AzTS_05_VMExtensionInventoryProcessor" and OperationName =~ "VMExtensionInventoryProcessing"
| where ProcessingStatus_s !~ "Initiated"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize 
Succeeded = countif(ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Succeeded"),
Failed = countif(ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Failed") by OperationName = tolower(OperationName), ResourceType = tolower(ResourceType)
| order by OperationName, ResourceType 
) on OperationName, ResourceType
| extend Dangling = iff(InitiatedCount == Failed + Succeeded, 0, InitiatedCount-Failed-Succeeded)
| project OperationName, ResourceType, ResourceCount = TotalVMCount, InitiatedCount, Succeeded, Failed, Dangling

content.PartSubTitle: This chart shows progress of VM,VMSS,Azure Arc server agents/extensions details being fetched.

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>);
Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where ResourceType =~ "VirtualMachine"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| extend  OSType = tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).OSType)
| summarize count() by OSType

content.Query:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>);
Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where Source_s contains "AzTS_02_ScopeResolverProcessor"
//| where ResourceType =~ "VirtualMachine"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| extend  OSType = tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).OSType)
| summarize TotalCount = count() by OSType = tolower( OSType)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>);
let virtualMachines = Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where ResourceType =~ "VirtualMachine"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| extend  OSType = tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).OSType)
| project VMResourceID = ResourceId, OSType;
let virtualMachinesExtensions = Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where ResourceType =~ "VMExtension" and Source_s =~ "AzTS_05_VMExtensionInventoryProcessor"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| extend VMResourceID = tolower(substring(ResourceId,0,indexof(ResourceId, '/', 0, -1, 9 )))
| extend ExtensionType = tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).ExtensionType)
| project ResourceId, VMResourceID, ExtensionType;
virtualMachines
| join kind=leftouter (virtualMachinesExtensions) on VMResourceID
| summarize Extensions = make_list(ExtensionType) by VMResourceID, OSType
|summarize TotalVM = count(), MMAAgent = countif(Extensions contains "MicrosoftMonitoringAgent" or Extensions contains "OmsAgentForLinux"),
HasAMAAgent = countif(Extensions contains "AzureMonitorWindowsAgent" or Extensions contains "AzureMonitorLinuxAgent"),
HasBothAgent = countif((Extensions contains "MicrosoftMonitoringAgent" or Extensions contains "OmsAgentForLinux") and (Extensions contains "AzureMonitorWindowsAgent" or Extensions contains "AzureMonitorLinuxAgent")) by OSType

content.Query:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>);
let virtualMachines = Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
//| where ResourceType =~ "VirtualMachine"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| extend  OSType = tolower(tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).OSType))
| where (isnotempty(OSType)) 
| project VMResourceID = ResourceId, OSType;
let virtualMachinesExtensions = Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago) and Source_s =~ "AzTS_05_VMExtensionInventoryProcessor"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| extend VMResourceID = tolower(substring(ResourceId,0,indexof(ResourceId, '/', 0, -1, 9 )))
| extend ExtensionType = tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).ExtensionType)
| project ResourceId, VMResourceID, ExtensionType;
virtualMachines
| join kind=leftouter (virtualMachinesExtensions) on VMResourceID
| summarize Extensions = make_list(ExtensionType) by VMResourceID, OSType
|summarize TotalServices = count(), ServicesWithOnlyMMAAgent = countif((array_length(Extensions) == 1) and (Extensions contains "MicrosoftMonitoringAgent" or Extensions contains "OmsAgentForLinux" or Extensions contains "")),
ServicesWithOnlyAMAAgent = countif((array_length(Extensions) == 1) and (Extensions contains "AzureMonitorWindowsAgent" or Extensions contains "AzureMonitorLinuxAgent")),
ServicesWithBothAgents = countif((Extensions contains "MicrosoftMonitoringAgent" or Extensions contains "OmsAgentForLinux") and (Extensions contains "AzureMonitorWindowsAgent" or Extensions contains "AzureMonitorLinuxAgent")) by OSType
content.PartSubTitle: Count of Azure services having only MMA, only AMA & both the agents.

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>);
let virtualMachines = Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where ResourceType =~ "VirtualMachine"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| extend  OSType = tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).OSType)
| project VMResourceID = ResourceId, OSType;
let virtualMachinesExtensions = Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where ResourceType =~ "VMExtension" and Source_s =~ "AzTS_05_VMExtensionInventoryProcessor"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| extend VMResourceID = tolower(substring(ResourceId,0,indexof(ResourceId, '/', 0, -1, 9 )))
| extend ExtensionType = tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).ExtensionType)
| project ResourceId, VMResourceID, ExtensionType;
virtualMachines
| join kind=leftouter (virtualMachinesExtensions) on VMResourceID
| summarize Extensions = make_list(ExtensionType) by VMResourceID, OSType
| where (Extensions contains "MicrosoftMonitoringAgent" or Extensions contains "OmsAgentForLinux") and (Extensions contains "AzureMonitorWindowsAgent" or Extensions contains "AzureMonitorLinuxAgent")
| summarize count() by OSType

content.Query:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>);
let virtualMachines = Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| extend  OSType = tostring(tolower(parse_json(Metadata_s).OSType))
| project VMResourceID = ResourceId, OSType;
let virtualMachinesExtensions = Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago) and Source_s =~ "AzTS_05_VMExtensionInventoryProcessor"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| extend VMResourceID = tolower(substring(ResourceId,0,indexof(ResourceId, '/', 0, -1, 9 )))
| extend ExtensionType = tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).ExtensionType)
| project ResourceId, VMResourceID, ExtensionType;
virtualMachines
| join kind=leftouter (virtualMachinesExtensions) on VMResourceID
| summarize Extensions = make_list(ExtensionType) by VMResourceID, OSType
| where (Extensions contains "MicrosoftMonitoringAgent" or Extensions contains "OmsAgentForLinux" or Extensions contains "msmonitoringagent") and (Extensions contains "AzureMonitorWindowsAgent" or Extensions contains "AzureMonitorLinuxAgent")
| summarize count() by OSType

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>);
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where ResourceType =~ "VMExtension" and Source_s == "AzTS_07_ExtensionRemovalProcessor"
| where ProcessingStatus_s !~ "Initiated"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| where ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Failed"
| extend ErrorCode =  tostring(parse_json(ProcessErrorDetails_s).ErrorCode)
| summarize count() by ErrorCode

content.PartSubTitle: This chart shows error code wise failed requests summary.

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>);
let virtualMachinesExtensions = toscalar(Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where ResourceType =~ "VMExtension" and Source_s =~ "AzTS_05_VMExtensionInventoryProcessor"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| extend VMResourceID = tolower(substring(ResourceId,0,indexof(ResourceId, '/', 0, -1, 9 )))
| extend ExtensionType = tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).ExtensionType)
| project ResourceId, VMResourceID, ExtensionType
| summarize Extensions = make_list(ExtensionType) by VMResourceID
| where (Extensions contains "MicrosoftMonitoringAgent" or Extensions contains "OmsAgentForLinux") and (Extensions contains "AzureMonitorWindowsAgent" or Extensions contains "AzureMonitorLinuxAgent")
| count);
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where ResourceType =~ "VMExtension" and Source_s == "AzTS_07_ExtensionRemovalProcessor"
| where ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Initiated"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize InitiatedCount = count() by OperationName = tolower(OperationName), ResourceType = tolower(ResourceType)
| join kind=leftouter (
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where ResourceType =~ "VMExtension" and Source_s == "AzTS_07_ExtensionRemovalProcessor"
| where ProcessingStatus_s !~ "Initiated"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize 
Succeeded = countif(ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Succeeded"),
Failed = countif(ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Failed") by OperationName = tolower(OperationName), ResourceType = tolower(ResourceType)
| order by OperationName, ResourceType 
) on OperationName, ResourceType
| extend Dangling = iff(InitiatedCount == Failed + Succeeded, 0, InitiatedCount-Failed-Succeeded)
| project OperationName, ResourceType, ResourceCount = virtualMachinesExtensions, InitiatedCount, Succeeded, Failed, Dangling

content.Query:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>);
let virtualMachinesExtensions = toscalar(Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago) and Source_s =~ "AzTS_05_VMExtensionInventoryProcessor"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| extend VMResourceID = tolower(substring(ResourceId,0,indexof(ResourceId, '/', 0, -1, 9 )))
| extend ExtensionType = tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).ExtensionType)
| project ResourceId, VMResourceID, ExtensionType
| summarize Extensions = make_list(ExtensionType) by VMResourceID
| where (Extensions contains "MicrosoftMonitoringAgent" or Extensions contains "OmsAgentForLinux" or Extensions contains "MSMonitoringAgent") and (Extensions contains "AzureMonitorWindowsAgent" or Extensions contains "AzureMonitorLinuxAgent")
| count);
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago) and Source_s == "AzTS_07_ExtensionRemovalProcessor"
| where ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Initiated"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize InitiatedCount = count() by OperationName = tolower(OperationName), ResourceType = tolower(ResourceType)
| join kind=leftouter (
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago) and Source_s == "AzTS_07_ExtensionRemovalProcessor"
| where ProcessingStatus_s !~ "Initiated"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| summarize 
Succeeded = countif(ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Succeeded"),
Failed = countif(ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Failed") by OperationName = tolower(OperationName), ResourceType = tolower(ResourceType)
| order by OperationName, ResourceType 
) on OperationName, ResourceType
| extend Dangling = iff(InitiatedCount == Failed + Succeeded, 0, InitiatedCount-Failed-Succeeded)
| project OperationName, ResourceType, ResourceCount = virtualMachinesExtensions, InitiatedCount, Succeeded, Failed, Dangling

content.PartSubTitle: This chart shows status of MMA extension removal request status.

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>);
let virtualMachinesExtensions = toscalar(Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where ResourceType =~ "VMExtension" and Source_s =~ "AzTS_05_VMExtensionInventoryProcessor"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| extend VMResourceID = tolower(substring(ResourceId,0,indexof(ResourceId, '/', 0, -1, 9 )))
| extend ExtensionType = tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).ExtensionType)
| project ResourceId, VMResourceID, ExtensionType
| summarize Extensions = make_list(ExtensionType) by VMResourceID
| where (Extensions contains "MicrosoftMonitoringAgent" or Extensions contains "OmsAgentForLinux") and (Extensions contains "AzureMonitorWindowsAgent" or Extensions contains "AzureMonitorLinuxAgent")
| count);
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where ResourceType =~ "VMExtension" and Source_s == "AzTS_08_ExtensionRemovalStatusCheckProcessor"
| where ProcessingStatus_s !~ "Initiated"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| where ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Succeeded"
| summarize  OpeartionName = "ExtensionRemoval", TotalVMs = virtualMachinesExtensions, MMAAgentRemovedFromVM = count() //by OperationName

content.Query:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>);
let virtualMachinesExtensions = toscalar(Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago) and Source_s =~ "AzTS_05_VMExtensionInventoryProcessor"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| extend VMResourceID = tolower(substring(ResourceId,0,indexof(ResourceId, '/', 0, -1, 9 )))
| extend ExtensionType = tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).ExtensionType)
| project ResourceId, VMResourceID, ExtensionType
| summarize Extensions = make_list(ExtensionType) by VMResourceID
| where (Extensions contains "MicrosoftMonitoringAgent" or Extensions contains "OmsAgentForLinux" or Extensions contains "MSMonitoringAgent") and (Extensions contains "AzureMonitorWindowsAgent" or Extensions contains "AzureMonitorLinuxAgent")
| count);
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago) and Source_s == "AzTS_08_ExtensionRemovalStatusCheckProcessor"
| where ProcessingStatus_s !~ "Initiated"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| where ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Succeeded"
| summarize  OpeartionName = "ExtensionRemoval", TotalExtensions = virtualMachinesExtensions, ServicesWithMMAAgentRemoved = count() //by OperationName
content.PartTitle: Summary: Total MMA agents successfully removed
content.PartSubTitle: This chart shows total count of Azure Services from which MMA agent has been successfully removed.

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>);
let virtualMachinesExtensions = toscalar(Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where ResourceType =~ "VMExtension" and Source_s =~ "AzTS_05_VMExtensionInventoryProcessor"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| extend VMResourceID = tolower(substring(ResourceId,0,indexof(ResourceId, '/', 0, -1, 9 )))
| extend ExtensionType = tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).ExtensionType)
| project ResourceId, VMResourceID, ExtensionType
| summarize Extensions = make_list(ExtensionType) by VMResourceID
| where (Extensions contains "MicrosoftMonitoringAgent" or Extensions contains "OmsAgentForLinux") and (Extensions contains "AzureMonitorWindowsAgent" or Extensions contains "AzureMonitorLinuxAgent")
| count);
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago)
| where ResourceType =~ "VMExtension" and Source_s == "AzTS_08_ExtensionRemovalStatusCheckProcessor"
| where ProcessingStatus_s !~ "Initiated"

content.Query:
let timeago = timespan(<timespanValue>);
let virtualMachinesExtensions = toscalar(Inventory_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago) and Source_s =~ "AzTS_05_VMExtensionInventoryProcessor"
| where ResourceId  contains "microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
| extend VMResourceID = tolower(substring(ResourceId,0,indexof(ResourceId, '/', 0, -1, 9 )))
| extend ExtensionType = tostring(parse_json(Metadata_s).ExtensionType)
| project ResourceId, VMResourceID, ExtensionType
| summarize Extensions = make_list(ExtensionType) by VMResourceID
| where (Extensions contains "MicrosoftMonitoringAgent" or Extensions contains "OmsAgentForLinux" or Extensions contains "MSMonitoringAgent") and (Extensions contains "AzureMonitorWindowsAgent" or Extensions contains "AzureMonitorLinuxAgent")
| count);
InventoryProcessingStatus_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeago) and Source_s == "AzTS_08_ExtensionRemovalStatusCheckProcessor"
| where ProcessingStatus_s !~ "Initiated"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tolower(ResourceId)
| where ProcessingStatus_s =~ "Succeeded"
| where ResourceId  contains "microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets"
| summarize OperationName = "ExtensionRemoval", TotalVMSSExtensions = virtualMachinesExtensions, VMSSWithMMAAgentRemoved = count()
content.PartTitle: Summary: Total MMA agents successfully removed  on VMSS
content.PartSubTitle: This chart shows total count of VMSS from which MMA agent has been successfully removed.

| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ResourceId = tolower(ResourceId)
